name: SpeakUpGetNoticedwithSteveLowell
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Stop looking and sounding like everybody else! Learn to stand out, get noticed and positon yourself as THE known expert in your field all by simply changing the way you speak.

This podcast will change the way you present yourself and your business. Whether it’s to a single prospect or an audience of thousands you’ll know exactly how to stand above your competition by sounding totally different from everyone else.

From branding to public speaking to everyday business interactions, your speech and your personal story will resonate further if you follow the advice in this flash briefing.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
